Buffalo.Seneca station (Buffalo Metro Rail): Seneca is a Buffalo Metro Rail station located in the 200 block of Main Street between Seneca and Swan Streets in the Free Fare Zone, which allows passengers free travel between Erie Canal Harbor station and Fountain Plaza station. Passengers continuing northbound past Fountain Plaza are required to provide proof-of-payment. Seneca station is one of only two stations that are the closest to the Amtrak Exchange Street station located on Exchange Street (just east of Washington Street) beneath Interstate 190 (the other being Erie Canal Harbor station, located 1,584 feet south).
